mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cargo(CARGO_ID, BOSS_ID, CARGO_NAME, CARGO_WEIGHT, BEGIN_LOCATION, END_LOCATION,distance,VALUE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, STOCK, INFO) VALUES (#{cargoId},#{bossId},#{cargoName},#{cargoWeight},#{beginLocation},#{endLocation},#{distance},#{value},#{beginTime},#{endTime},#{stock},#{info})
mapper.select: SELECT cargo_id,boss_id,cargo_name,cargo_weight,begin_location,end_location,distance,value,begin_time,end_time,stock,info FROM cargo ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{code} = 1 THEN begin_time WHEN #{code} = 2 THEN end_time WHEN #{code} = 3 THEN value WHEN #{code} = 4 THEN stock WHEN #{code} = 5 THEN distance END ASC

SELECT cargo_id,boss_id,cargo_name,cargo_weight,begin_location,end_location,distance,value,begin_time,end_time,stock,info FROM cargo ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{code} = -1 THEN begin_time WHEN #{code} = -2 THEN end_time WHEN #{code} = -3 THEN value WHEN #{code} = -4 THEN stock WHEN #{code} = -5 THEN distance END DESC
